posts.post_content:
To quickly see what I have, go to scans below.

PM if you must, but I much prefer email: [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url]

Page 1[STRIKE]--A page of Poors, $200, delivered--[/STRIKE] 4 left + 4 new ones: Donlin, Dygert, Dunn, Ritter--8 for $110 delivered--

A note on pricing: Giving you a page price, I've already discounted 10-15%, and that price is firm. I'll give the full-page sale one day, afterwhich I'll sell cards individually. If you want an individual card/cards, let me know and I'll give you a price.  Individually, the Page 1 cards are from $13-17 delivered, with discounts for multiple items and combined shipping. 
  
First to take a card gets it.

First to take a card gets it. 

Most forms of payment okay; paypal as friend; thanks.

I am continually upgrading [looking for hall-of-famers, SL's, SP's, Fair or better, commons, Good or better], so if you're interested in trading, let me know what you have. I prefer ungraded cards. 

*Note on Scans: As the page is turned, the backs are in reverse order. 
Also, the cards are in two protective plastics, a halved penny-sleeve--which creates the appearance of a vertical line on each card--and a pocket-page:
Received the Rockenfeld today...fast shipping, good price, thanks!
